website_summaries.verdict: Minecraft players who enjoy farming and LEGO fans who appreciate creative building sets will get a kick out of this functional and charmingly silly chicken coop playset.
pros: Includes 3 Chickens, Tamed Wolf, and Alex minifigures
Build a towering chicken-shaped chicken coop

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a 9 year old in ICU at the hospital (head trauma). Kept her entertained and was easy to focus on. Also helped with memory and strength exercises. Was a big hit. Plus the nurses learned a lot about Minecraft as she got her voice back! All around a great buy for any LEGO or Minecraft fan.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen in Green

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft fun without the screen!
customer_reviews.text: Lego Minecraft sets are great because they are easy for youngee Lego fans to build and the bricks are pretty generic so they can be used for other creations! My boys love to play Minecraft but like most parents, we try to moderate screen time... this and the other Lego Minecraft sets allow kids to create their own Minecraft worlds without the screen!
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Chicken obsessed kid. He doesn’t care about Minecraft at all but the pieces are more featured on Chickens than Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: StarrMom

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft The Chicken  Coop
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my 7 yr. old nephew's birthday. He has alot of lego Minecraft sets so this set was to add to his collection. He was really happy to receive this Minecraft The Chicken Coop set and I was happy that Amazon offered it as it is hard to find in the stores. I would recommend to any Lego Minecraft fans.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy555

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and put the set together in no time at all without any adult help. She is a minecraft superfan and lego sets that look like the things she builds in minecraft are a hit!
customer_reviews.author: ReaderGirl

customer_reviews.title: ... youngest son loves minecraft and these legos are his favorite thing at the moment
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son loves minecraft and these legos are his favorite thing at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this for Christmas. He was so excited when he opened it. I think the age should be 8 years and up. His mom had to help him put it together. He still loved it. As always legos are a great creative quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: It was simple to put together but we enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and we had run putting it together. The large chicken moves so that eggs you put inside drop out in a chest. It was simple to put together but we enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. Fast delivery. Will buy from again A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My nephew actually owns pet chickens and really enjoys legos. Therefore, I thought about combining two things he enjoys. He liked this gift.
customer_reviews.author: revereintellengence

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this Minecraft Legos set for my granddaughter for her 8th birthday. I let her pick it out and she was beyond excited when it came in the mail. Minecraft has made a resurgence and is more popular than ever. My granddaughter loves these Legos! I am amazed that, with the smaller pieces, she can put them together so easily. I think Legos are great for brain development and hours of enjoyment for kids. The set is so cute and is an incredible value for the money. I recommend this fun set for children who are fascinated, or not, with Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Claud Alkire

customer_reviews.title: A Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who loves Minecraft chickens and he had a great time putting it together and permanently gluing them in place for his display. I would definitely get a similar kit for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bock

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons loved the coop. I have a small farm and the kids always head for our coop to see the chickens and gather the eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo cute. My 5 year old is obsessed with Minecraft at the moment and I thought the chicks were adorable. Let me tell you they are cuter in person. He was so excited to receive it as a gift and immediately built it.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down BEST Minecraft Set
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because it looked cool and it really is! It's the best minecraft set we have. The large and small chickens it comes with are so cute and the large hatches eggs and they land in a treasure box. It's a really cute set you won't regret buying. We purchsed for $15 and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. Finished project has a peg that you pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Finished project has a peg that you pull and the giant chicken lays an egg in the treasure chest. 6 year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Tyra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, my kiddo went crazy for it
customer_reviews.text: exactly what you expect out of Lego. Great quality, my kiddo went crazy for it. It is not so intense that a child couldn't do it. Really great little design the chicken lays eggs into the chest and the gates open. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edw90

customer_reviews.title: Love these easy to assembly alone kits for keeping the kids busy.
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo is on a Minecraft kick and loves these sets. I needed something to keep him occupied during lock down (something that he could build on his own so I could work) and a combo of a few of these kits put together did the trick. He now has his own Minecraft world to play with. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It’s LEGO and Minecraft- so yeah, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say? LEGO rarely gets a set wrong. I’ve only had one horrible LEGO set. This isn’t it. This ones is great.
customer_reviews.author: DollyMaker

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO gift for kids that have their own chickens & coup
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 5 yr old grandson for Christmas He loved it as has 7 chickens of his own

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know yet
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. I won’t have any feedback until after she plays with them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Misenar

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old nephew who is obsessed with Minecraft, and he loved it! That's about all I can say about it, though. It made my nephew very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Daniels

customer_reviews.title: My son is in love
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old built this in a flash and he loves it. it was difficult but attainable for him to build on his own. he loves the little eggs and chickens and likes to set his up exactly like the photo on the box, which is totally possible. great toy, great product, exactly like the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a blast putting this one together! It was challenging enough to take her a little over an hour but easy enough for her to do herself!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Lego plus minecraft = very happy boy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this set. He is obsessed with all things minecraft right now so this rocked his boat. The fact it is also a lego product just made it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: judi crockett

customer_reviews.title: Oh so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my son for his birthday because he has recently started raising chickens! He said it went together quickly...and is so fun...as it has moving parts, including a chicken that lays an egg and the egg can be retrieved from a drawer that slides out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo loves it. It was easy to put together and he loves to play with it. Most of these Minecraft Lego sets are not that bad. They aren't as expensive as other sets and they offer a lot of playability (is that even a word)
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanLost

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's birthday. He just turned 8. Easy enough for him to do on his own. Came with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nickol

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected but there isn't much to this lego set. My 6 year old son put it together easily and enjoyed it. We thought it was interesting that this set has a feature that allows you to place an egg in the big chicken and it drops into a secret treasure chest. Comes with a tamed wolf and extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Messer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for any Minecraft fan! Both boys loved creating this set! One was for my son, and the other for a classmate's birthday! It's fun, and imaginative. They loved the chickens, and it was certainly fun adding it with other lego minecraft sets too! My sons love to make them, and then tear them down to rebuild.
customer_reviews.author: chicmama

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a Minecraft loving Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my Grandson who is almost 6 and is a Minecraft fan!! He called to tell me he LOVED it and was so happy Gramma got it for him!! SCORE!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenheart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Really cute Minecraft set. Gave to our youngest for his 6th birthday. His 11 year old sister helped him assemble it. They both enjoyed working on it and playing with the chicken laying an egg.

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos loved these and Minecraft, avengers and Harry Potter are the ones we always stick to because my kids love to keep these ones out together and on their shelves where they continue to play gently with them and enjoy to see them in general.

customer_reviews.title: The chicken poops eggs 😂
customer_reviews.text: Had zero idea the chicken poops eggs until my son out it together and showed me. We laughed and laughed. He is 7 and loves Minecraft so it was the perfect gift.

product_meta.title: LEGO Minecraft The Chicken Coop 21140 Building Kit (198 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Have fun tending to the chickens at the Chicken Coop, featuring an elevated henhouse that delivers eggs directly into a chest. Enjoy hands-on adventures with this LEGO Minecraft 21140 The Chicken Coop set—designed for young fans of the highly successful video game. Combine this set with other LEGO Minecraft models to create your own unique LEGO Minecraft universe. Includes an Alex LEGO Minecraft minifigure, plus baby chicken and tamed wolf figures, and 2 chicken figures.
feature_bullets: Build a LEGO Minecraft chicken farm with chicken pen, furnace, water and grass areas and an elevated henhouse that delivers Minecraft chicken eggs directly into a chest!
This LEGO Minecraft set includes an Alex Minecraft minifigure, plus baby chicken and tamed wolf figures, and 2 chicken figures
Measures over 4-inch (11cm) high, 5-inch (14cm) wide and 5-inch (14cm) deep
198 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14
LEGO Minecraft building sets are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,141 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
